com.intel.icecp.module.storage

Class StorageModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.module.storage.StorageModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intel.icecp.core.Module

    @ModuleProperty(name="StorageModule",
                attributes=AckChannelAttribute.class)
public class StorageModule
extends Object
implements com.intel.icecp.core.Module
    Module that implements persistent storage capabilities

      • run

        public void run(com.intel.icecp.core.Node node,
                com.intel.icecp.core.attributes.Attributes attributes)
        Storage module for persisting messages

        Ex: This module will receive messages from icecp-module-fork which it will persist into it's database

        Specified by:
        run in interface com.intel.icecp.core.Module
        Parameters:
        node - the node the module is currently running on
        attributes - set of attributes Attributes defined for the module

      • addChannel

        public void addChannel(Long sessionId,
                       com.intel.icecp.core.Channel<com.intel.icecp.core.messages.BytesMessage> channel,
                       Integer maxBufferingPeriodInSec)
        Add a channel reference to the list with configurable maximum buffering period.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - Session ID for the channel
        channel - Channel reference
        maxBufferingPeriodInSec - Maximum integral value for buffering period in second for data kept in the storage module before it is uploaded successfully

      • addChannel

      • addChannel

        public void addChannel(Long sessionId,
                       com.intel.icecp.core.Channel<com.intel.icecp.core.messages.BytesMessage> channel,
                       Integer maxBufferingPeriodInSec,
                       PersistCallback callback)
        Add a channel reference to the list with configurable maximum buffering period.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - Session ID for the channel
        channel - Channel reference
        maxBufferingPeriodInSec - Maximum integral value for buffering period in second for data kept in the storage module before it is uploaded successfully
        callback - Channel callback reference
